feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-08-01T00:34:24.335297Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;帮助国会图书馆创建游戏，以提高公众的公民知识</stitle>; <id>;https://blogs.loc.gov/law/2023/06/help-the -library-of-congress-create-video-games-that-improve-public-knowledge-of-civics/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T23:33:49.619015Z</更新>; <link href= “https://blogs.loc.gov/law/2023/06/help-the-library-of-congress-create-video-games-that-improve-public-knowledge-of-civics/”/>; <作者>; <name>;aaronbrethorst</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aaronbrethorst</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //blogs.loc.gov/law/files/2023/06/LC-Logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;美国国会图书馆正在发起一项针对视频游戏开发者的挑战，要求他们创建与公民相关的有趣、轻量级视频游戏，并结合国会图书馆的资源。获胜的游戏将在美国国会图书馆托管供美国公众使用的国会网站。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#help-the-library-of-congress-create-games-to-improve-public-knowledge-of-civics " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36950075" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;格陵兰岛东部的冰芯科学家到达基岩</stitle>; <id >;https://news.ku.dk/all_news/2023/07/pay-dirt-for-ice-core-scientists-in-east-greenland-as-they-reach-bedrock/</id>; <更新>; 2023-07-31T16:33:49.620076Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ku.dk/all_news/2023/07/pay-dirt-for-ice-core-scientists-in-east -greenland-as-they-reach-bedrock/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;giuliomagnifico </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico </uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://science.ku.dk/english/press/news/2023/pay-dirt-for-ice-core-scientists-in-east-greenland- as-ey-reach-bedrock/billedinformationer/hul_i_isen.png" style="width: 220px;高度：120px;" />;<br />;一项国际研究合作已成功钻探到格陵兰冰盖底部，这是首次在冰流中实现这一突破。这一突破可以为气候变化和气候变化提供宝贵的见解。海平面上升。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ice-core-scientists-in-east-greenland-reach-bedrock" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36944978" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Icanhazip：一个简单的 IP 地址工具在大量用户中幸存下来 (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.apnic .net/2021/06/17/how-a-small-free-ip-tool-survived/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T20:33:49.620902Z</更新>; <link href="https ://blog.apnic.net/2021/06/17/how-a-small-free-ip-tool-survived/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;broken_codez</名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=broken_codez</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.apnic.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/ 06/icanhazip-ft-555x202.jpg?v=26c5ffdc4d36be65804773fa9bbbf69a" style="宽度：220px; height: 81px;" />;<br />;自创建以来的十年里，icanhazip 已被证明对世界各地的网络运营商很有用，但很少有人知道托管它有多么具有挑战性。 <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#icanhazip-a-simple-ip-address-tool-survived-a-deluge-of-users-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36948164" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;通过验证码检索您的浏览历史记录 (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://varun.ch/history</id>; <updated>;2023 -07-31T23：33：49.621705Z </更新>; <link href="https://varun.ch/history"/>; <作者>; <名称>;miki123211 </名称>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=miki123211</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;浏览器历史记录功能会记录用户访问过的页面，并以紫色突出显示访问过的链接。但是，浏览器供应商实施了限制，以防止利用这个特性。为了绕过这些限制，我们创建了一个概念证明，通过选择黑色方块来诱骗访问者透露他们的浏览历史记录。这会带来隐私风险，只能通过禁用已访问链接突出显示来解决。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#retriving-your-browsing-history-through-a-captcha-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36949988" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;大麻成瘾：那些挣扎的人常常面临怀疑</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2023/07/31/ marijuana-addiction-legal-recreational-sales/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T18:33:49.622542Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2023/ 07/31/marijuana-addiction-legal-recreational-sales/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;andrewl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andrewl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;考特尼是一名长期吸食大麻的人，尽管感到上瘾，但仍难以戒烟。许多人认为大麻成瘾不如其他物质严重，导致怀疑和不愿寻求治疗。然而，专家承认大麻可能会上瘾，并且经常吸食大麻的人数有所增加。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#marijuana-addiction-those-struggling-often-face-skepticism" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36946104" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用语法树每天分块 2M 个文件进行代码搜索</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.sweep.dev/blogs/chunking-2m-files </id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T21:33:49.623320Z</更新>; <link href="https://docs.sweep.dev/blogs/chunking-2m-files"/>; <作者>; < name>;kevinlu1248</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kevinlu1248</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;每天分块 2M 文件进行代码搜索语法树 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#chunking-2m-files-a-day-for-code-search-using-syntax-trees" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36948403" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;幻想与现实相遇</stitle>; <id>;https://cabel.com/2023/07/30/fantasy -meets-reality/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T19:33:49.624080Z</更新>; <link href="https://cabel.com/2023/07/30/fantasy-meets-reality /"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dmazin</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dmazin</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://i0.wp.com/cabel.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/photobooth1-upscaled.png?fit=1180%2C1180&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;设计师经常低估人们在现实世界中与他们的设计互动的方式。本文探讨了为人类行为进行设计的挑战以及考虑人们体验和互动的多种方式的重要性与世界。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fantasy-meets-reality" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36939648" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;USearch：更小更快的单文件矢量搜索引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://unum-cloud.github.io/usearch/</id>; <更新>; 2023-07-31T18：33：49.625636Z </更新>; <link href =“https://unum-cloud.github.io/usearch/”/>; <作者>; <名称>; 0xedb </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=0xedb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://unum-cloud.github.io/usearch/ _static/unum.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;USearch 是一个高性能矢量搜索引擎，它扩展了支持的指标列表，并允许针对各种应用程序进行定制。它具有内存效率高，并且支持不同矢量表示之间的向下转换和向上转换。USearch可用于模糊搜索、连接和语义搜索。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#usearch-smaller-and-faster-single-file-vector-search-engine" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36942993" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Markwhen：时间线 Markdown</stitle>; <id>;https:// /app.markwhen.com</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T18:33:49.626433Z</更新>; <link href="https://app.markwhen.com"/>; <作者>; <名称>; koch</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=koch</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;创建、查看和共享 markwhen 时间线 <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-markwhen-markdown-for-timelines" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36944152" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;LK-99：室温超导体的现场在线竞赛</stitle>; <id>;https://forums.spacebattles.com/threads/claims-of-room-Temperature -and-ambient-Pressure-superconductor.1106083/page-11?post=94266395#post-94266395</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T09:33:49.628107Z</更新>; <link href="https: //forums.spacebattles.com/threads/claims-of-room-Temperature-and-ambient-Pressure-superconductor.1106083/page-11?post=94266395#post-94266395"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fofoz< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fofoz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia. org/wikipedia/commons/1/1c/Blondlot_N-rays.png" style="width: 220px; height: 292px;" />;<br />;正在进行多项复制工作以验证室温超导体的说法。一些研究人员对此表示怀疑，认为所提供的数据不足以证明超导性。但是，有个人和实验室尝试复制该实验并获得与论文一致的结果。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lk-99-the-live-online-race-for-a-room-Temperature-超导体" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36940323" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NASA 错误地切断了与 Voyager 2 的通信</stitle>; <id >;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/31/nasa_mistakenly_disconnects_voyager_2/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T10:33:49.629720Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .theregister.com/2023/07/31/nasa_mistakenly_disconnects_voyager_2/"/>; <作者>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2017/12/03/voyager_probe_shutterstock.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;NASA 的 Voyager 2 探测器目前因天线指向错误方向而无法与外界联系。预计该探测器将很快重新校准其位置，并且该故障预计不会影响其轨迹. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nasa-mistakenly-severs-communication-to-voyager-2" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36940626" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;矮人要塞中的秘密身份（2017）</stitle>; <id>;https://ojs.aaai.org/index.php/AIIDE/article/view /12963</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T20:33:49.630514Z</更新>; <link href="https://ojs.aaai.org/index.php/AIIDE/article/view/12963" />; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://ojs.aaai.org/public/journals/5/cover_issue_414_en_US.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 285px;" />;<br />;《矮人要塞》是一款流行的 roguelike 游戏，正在进行重大更新，为非玩家角色引入秘密身份。此更新以文物为中心，带来了技术和设计挑战。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#secret-identities-in-dwarf-fortress-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36930290" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;太空垃圾：印度称在澳大利亚发现的物体是他们的</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/world-australia-66359381</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T18:33:49.631263Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-australia-66359381"/>; <作者>; <名称>;vinni2< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vinni2</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ichef.bbci. co.uk/news/976/cpsprodpb/1737C/product/_130400159_unidentifieditem.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;印度已确认在西澳大利亚海滩上发现的一个物体来自其一枚火箭。该物体据信是极地卫星运载火箭（PSLV）的第三级， 7 月中旬在 Green Head 海滩发现。印度航天局发言人表示，将由澳大利亚决定如何处理该物体。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#space- junk-india-says-object-found-in-australia-is-theirs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36943263" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;现代语言的“基本电脑游戏”代码</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/coding-horror/basic-computer-games</id>; <updated>;2023-07-31T16:33 ：49.632091Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/coding-horror/basic-computer-games"/>; <作者>; <name>;martincmartin</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=martincmartin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/a1483e08d74834c8aac5be73b8038859704ce610d9923aa1953ec124c3f947d8/coding-horror/basic-电脑游戏" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;我们正在更新 2022 年及以后第一本销量百万的计算机书籍《BASIC 计算机游戏》。原始 BASIC 源代码已移至每个项目的单独文件夹中。游戏已经过测试和调整，可与 Vintage BASIC 一起运行。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#basic-computer-games-code-in-modern-languages" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36945046" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;投资者愿意为技术支付溢价，但不愿意为人工智能支付溢价</stitle>; <id>;https://www. Bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-31/investors-are-happy-to-pay-premium-for-tech-but-not-for-ai</id>;<更新>;2023-07-31T15： 33:49.632957Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-31/investors-are-happy-to-pay-premium-for-tech-but -not-for-ai"/>; <作者>; <名称>;alex1212</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alex1212</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/i8uZ7byQE9vI/v0/1200x800.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;华尔街及其他地区的投资者对科技行业的未来持乐观态度，但对人工智能的潜力持怀疑态度。在最近的一项调查中，大多数受访者计划要么增加他们的投资投资科技股或维持其当前敞口。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#investors-are-happy-to-pay-premium-for-tech-but-not-for-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36943415" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Arch Linux 的 Temple OS 主题</stitle>; <id>;https: //github.com/PhilipPanda/TempleOS_Theme</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T23:33:49.633846Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/PhilipPanda/TempleOS_Theme"/>; <作者>; <name>;housemusicfan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=housemusicfan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://user-images.githubusercontent.com/123938029/256995692-78b32a20-3457-48ae-9f4b-00ecff0b8692.png" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;Temple OS 主题 / Rice For Arch Linux。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户来为 PhilipPanda/TempleOS_Theme 开发做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#temple -os-theme-for-arch-linux" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36950337" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;外壳及其糟糕的空白处理</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.plover.com/Unix/whitespace.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-31T03:33:49.634617Z</updated>; <link href ="https://blog.plover.com/Unix/whitespace.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;JNRowe</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JNRowe< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pic.blog.plover.com/TOP.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;由于对空格的处理有问题，Unix shell 编程继续受到鄙视。shell 处理带空格的文件名可能会导致意外的文件复制和覆盖。空格缺乏一致的行为在 shell 中是一个令人沮丧且不典型的错误。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-shell-and-its-crappy-handling-of-whitespace" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36933062" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;深入探究《银翼杀手》标题的奇怪历史 (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https:// www.vulture.com/2017/10/why-is-blade-runner-the-title-of-blade-runner.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T16:33:49.635377Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.vulture.com/2017/10/why-is-blade-runner-the-title-of-blade-runner.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thunderbong</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pyxis.nymag.com /v1/imgs/1e1/b9c/aa4c0791260b8619dd1e52a60fb036ac49-04-blade-runner-harrison-ford.rsquare.w700.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;《银翼杀手》系列中的“银翼杀手”一词从未在电影或所改编的小说中得到解释。该术语实际上源自另一部名为《银翼杀手》的小说，由艾伦·E·诺斯 (Alan E. Nourse) 撰写，后来由威廉·S·巴勒斯 (William S. Burroughs) 改编。这部小说讲述了一位名叫比利·金普 (Billy Gimp) 的银翼杀手在医疗保健反乌托邦中的冒险故事。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#digging -into-the-odd-history-of-blade-runners-title-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36944947" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;美国安全帽职位的空缺职位数量创历史新高</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/29/the-hard-hat-job-with-最高级别的未平仓头寸-ever-recorded.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T10:33:49.636137Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cnbc.com /2023/07/29/the-hard-hat-job-with-highest-level-of-open-positions-ever-recorded.html"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://image.cnbcfm.com/api/v1/image /107245575-1684869928285-1684868204722-STATEOFFREIGHT-KOJO.jpg?v=1690640827&w=750&h=422&vtcrop=y" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;美国经济在新冠疫情后的井喷式增长受到了工人短缺的阻碍，尤其是在建筑行业，该行业正面临着有记录以来最高水平的空缺职位空缺。建筑工人预计将持续存在，并且材料价格上涨和供应链中断会加剧这种情况。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#american-hard-hat-jobs-have-the-highest- level-of-open-positions-ever-recorded" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36936166" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;试图成为通过了解更多有关航空的知识，成为更好的开发人员</stitle>; <id>;https://medium.com/@Fcmam5/trying-to-become-a-better-developer-by-learning-more-about-aviation-5241e7092f7e< /id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T17:33:49.636900Z</更新>; <link href="https://medium.com/@Fcmam5/trying-to-become-a-better-developer-by- Learning-more-about-aviation-5241e7092f7e"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fcmam5</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fcmam5</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>;<img src=“https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fill:320:214/0*U6WOKafY_SQ59Ole.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 148px;" />;<br />;在过去的几个月里，我对航空以及它与软件工程的关系有了更多的了解。我发现我们可以从航空业学到很多教训，例如持续学习、培训和沟通的重要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trying-to-become-a-better-developer-by-learning-more-about-aviation" 目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36930322" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Linkwarden – 开源协作书签管理器</stitle>; < id>;https://linkwarden.app</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T14:33:49.637651Z</更新>; <link href="https://linkwarden.app"/>; <作者>; <名称>;DaniDaniel5005</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DaniDaniel5005</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://linkwarden .app/app/links.png" style="width: 220px; height: 106px;" />;<br />;Linkwarden 是一个完全可自托管的开源协作书签管理器，允许用户收集、组织和存档网页。它提供了从任何浏览器收集链接、组织链接等功能使用自定义标签和文件夹、创建集合、保留网页以及防止链接失效。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-linkwarden-an-open-source-collaborative-bookmark-经理" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36942308" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Unix 恢复传奇 (1986)</stitle>; <id>; https://www.ecb.torontomu.ca/~elf/hack/recovery.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T18:33:49.638505Z</更新>; <link href="https:// www.ecb.torontomu.ca/~elf/hack/recovery.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ohjeez</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ohjeez</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;一个关于 Unix 恢复传奇的故事，系统经历了灾难并丢失了重要文件，但团队通过用汇编程序编写程序并使用创造性的解决方案成功地恢复了。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unix-recovery-legend-1986" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36942994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;建造尼古拉特斯拉的无叶片涡轮机[视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tuzh9mHvzkk</id>; <更新>;2023-07- 31T17:33:49.639254Z</updated>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我离开 JAMstack 的旅程</stitle>; <id>;https://www.spicyweb.dev/farewell -jamstack/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T16:33:49.640003Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.spicyweb.dev/farewell-jamstack/"/>; <作者>; < name>;brycewray</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brycewray</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;作者分享了他们使用 JAMstack 的经验和解释了为什么他们已经放弃了它。他们认为 Web 开发行业应该默认采用不同的堆栈。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-journey-away-from-the-jamstack" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36944545" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电池电动“无限列车”将利用重力自行充电（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://newatlas.com/transport/fortescue-wae-infinity -train-electric/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-31T18:33:49.640745Z</更新>; <link href="https://newatlas.com/transport/fortescue-wae-infinity-train-electric /"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jermaustin1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jermaustin1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://assets.newatlas.com/dims4/default/0f96281/2147483647/strip/true/crop/5640x3760+0+0/resize/1200x800!/quality/90/?url=http%3A% 2F%2Fnewatlas-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2F28%2Faa%2Fbce340f74ad686760f2bba66604c%2Ffortescue-locomotive-eliwana.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;澳大利亚矿业公司 Fortescue 正在开发一种电动“无限列车”，无需充电即可运输铁矿石负载。该列车将在下坡路段进行再生电力，从而消除对可再生能源发电和充电基础设施的需求。该项目是 Fortescue 清理运营和开发绿色解决方案努力的一部分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#battery-electric-infinity-train-will-charge-itself-using-gravity-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36943635" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;卡片作为武器（1977）</stitle>;
